required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ultrasound-Guided Continuous Sciatic Nerve Blocks: Popliteal Versus Subgluteal Catheters
clinical_study.official_title: Ultrasound-Guided Continuous Sciatic Nerve Blocks: Popliteal Versus Subgluteal Catheters

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the relationship between perineural catheter location along the sciatic nerve (popliteal versus subgluteal placement) and infusion effects for ultrasound-guided continuous sciatic nerve blocks.

clinical_study.why_stopped: Surgeon doing procedures amenable to this study left institution.

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle Strength (MVIC) of the hamstring muscles
primary_outcome.time_frame: 08:00-09:00 morning after surgery as a percentage of baseline
primary_outcome.description: We will evaluate hamstring strength which is innervated by the sciatic nerve with an isometric force electromechanical dynamometer to measure the force produced during a maximum voluntary isometric contraction (MVIC) in a seated position with the knees flexed at 90ยบ

secondary_outcome.description: We will evaluate tolerance of transcutaneous electrical stimulation. Electrocardiogram pads will be placed on the plantar and dorsal aspects of the foot, and attached to a nerve stimulator. The current will be increased from 0 mA until subjects described a "buzzing" sensation (not painful), at which time the current will be recorded as the tolerated level and the nerve stimulator turned off.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from leaving the PACU until 08:00 the morning after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Surgical pain scores both average and worse as collected by nursing staff; and also the average and worse pain during the primary endpoint measurement

secondary_outcome.time_frame: recorded at 08:00-09:00 the morning after surgery for the previous night
secondary_outcome.description: Total number of times patient woke in the night due to surgical pain.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: recorded at 08:00-09:00 the morning following Surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Total infusiond duration in time and volume and total number of boluses delivered via catheter.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: recorded at 08:00-09:00 the morning following Surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Leakage from the catheter site noted by patient.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: end of PACU stay until 08:00-09:00 the morning following surgery

arm_group.description: Patients randomized to this group will receive a sciatic nerve block with the catheter tip insertion at the subgluteal location 1-3 cm caudad to the inferior border of the gluteus maximus muscle.
Patients randomized to this group will receive a sciatic nerve block with the catheter tip insertion at the popliteal location 1-3 cm cephalad to the sciatic bifurcation.

intervention.description: Patients randomized to this group will receive a sciatic nerve block with the catheter tip insertion at the subgluteal location 1-3 cm caudad to the inferior border of the gluteus maximus muscle. After catheter placement, outcome measures will be assessed.

Patients randomized to this group will receive a sciatic nerve block with the catheter tip insertion at the popliteal location 1-3 cm cephalad to the sciatic bifurcation. After Catheter placement outcome measures will be assessed.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- undergoing foot surgery with a sciatic perineural catheter for postoperative analgesia
- spending the first postoperative night hospitalized
- age 18 years or older
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnancy
- inability to communicate with the investigators and hospital staff
- incarceration
- clinical neuropathy in the surgical extremity

overall_official.affiliation: University of California, Department of Anesthesiology
